Support us by rating on the Play Store RATE US NOW Later Not Happy
This application is aimed at helping new toastmasters around the world to manage their speeches and roles effectively. Also, one can record practice speeches and save them against respective speech projects. Moreover, one can record which roles they have completed and efficiently schedule new roles for themselves. We have several features like sharing data with mentors, articles, managing goals in the pipeline.
Save the speech
